backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, lobbies, games, and player state with access control and functions for profile handling and lobby join/leave.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing offline mode and gameplay feature requirements with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files including views, scenes, hooks, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS layer defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component routing between home, training, lobby, online game, and offline skirmish views.
frontend/src/game/components/ImpactEffec: 3D component rendering short‑lived bullet impact effects with lights and particles.
frontend/src/game/components/PlayerArmsA: First‑person weapon viewmodel handling firing, recoil animation, and weapon configuration visuals.
frontend/src/game/components/RemotePlaye: Remote player avatar with smooth interpolation, capsule body, head, directional marker, and floating name label.
frontend/src/game/controls/useFpsControl: Implements FPS movement and camera controls with keyboard, mouse look, jumping, crouching, and gravity updated each frame.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Wrapper around React Three Fiber Canvas with performance-focused 3D rendering settings.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OfflineSkirmish: Renders an offline skirmish scene with moving targets, FPS controls, weapon firing with spread, and hit detection via raycasting.
frontend/src/game/scenes/OnlineMatchScen: Displays an online match environment, syncing local player position to the server and rendering remote players alongside FPS controls and impact effects.
frontend/src/game/scenes/TrainingScene.t: Provides a static training area with walls, cover, target dummies, and basic firing impact handling using FPS controls.
frontend/src/game/weapons/offlineWeapons: Defines basic weapon configurations for offline play including fire rate, spread, and damage.
frontend/src/game/weapons/useWeapon.ts: Hook managing weapon firing rate and computing shot direction from the camera before triggering the onFire callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, player state, lobby management, and game actions using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/HomeView.tsx: Renders the home menu with game mode buttons, authentication UI, and themed background.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyView.tsx: Provides multiplayer lobby UI with lobby listing, creation, joining, leaving, and game start functions.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineSkirmishView.t: Runs the offline skirmish mode with game canvas, hit/miss tracking, weapon switching, and a pause menu.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineGameView.tsx: Displays the online match scene with HUD and an ESC-based pause menu.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingView.tsx: Runs the training mode scene with HUD and a pause menu for returning or resuming.
frontend/src/ui/DisclaimerFooter.tsx: Renders a footer with an original-project disclaimer and a dynamic link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/ui/HudOverlay.tsx: Displays an in-game HUD showing crosshair, stats, and mode-specific info for online or offline play.
frontend/src/ui/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a sign-in/out button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/ui/ProfileSetupDialog.tsx: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to create a profile and save a callsign.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters and persisting them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing versioning, goals, constraints, and implemented features.
